name: Totally Accurate Giftwrapping Simulator
description:
Totally Accurate Giftwrapping Simulator is a glitchy-physics-based game where you are a sheet of sentient wrapping paper attempting to wrap presents!

It was written for the Yogscast Game Jam 2019

Theme: Giving!

We achieved the Foleyship Modifier. Every sound you hear in this game was made by us, in our hotel room, this weekend (even the music). And also a seagull, who was not inside our hotel room.
